CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cadre Holdings Inc is engaged in the design and manufacture of a diversified product portfolio of critical safety and survivability equipment to protect first responders, federal agencies, outdoor recreation, and personal protection markets. Its operations are comprised of two reportable segments: Products and Distribution.
